classification_data.text: Obrando en mi calidad de Revisor Fiscal de NEWSAT S.A.S. NIT. 830.513.366-3 CERTIFICO QUE: He revisado los libros oficiales de contabilidad de la empresa NEWSAT S.A.S., los cuales se encuentran debidamente inscritos en la Cámara de Comercio de Bogotá. Para los efectos de esta certificación he revisado información que he considerado necesaria y he seguido los procedimientos establecidos por las Normas de Auditoria Generalmente Aceptadas en Colombia. La composición accionaria de la empresa al 29 de febrero del 2024 es la siguiente: CC/NIT NOMBRE DEL ACCIONISTA ACCIONISTAS NEWSAT S.A.S. Let me extract all readable text: From the document, I can see: - "Obrando en mi calidad de Revisor Fiscal de NEWSAT S.A.S." - "NIT. 830.513.366-3" - "CERTIFICO QUE:" - Information about reviewing accounting books - "La composición accionaria de la empresa al 29 de febrero del 2024 es la siguiente:" - A table showing shareholder composition with names, number of shares, values, and percentages: - CARLOS ENRIQUE ROSERO CERON: 148.000 shares, $1.480.000.000,00, 40% - SHAI BERCOVICH: 148.000 shares, $1.480.000.000,00, 40% - DIEGO ALEJANDRO SALAZAR VASQUEZ: 74.000 shares, $740.000.000,00, 20% - TOTALES: 370.000 shares, $3.700.000.000,00, 100% - "La presente certificación se expide a solicitud de la empresa a los veinte (20) días del mes de marzo de 2024, con destino a entidades Gubernamentales y Financieras." - Signed by "ROBERTO LONDOÑO OSORIO, Revisor Fiscal, T.P. 153999-T" 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** This is not BLANK (has substantial content) and not LINK_ONLY (no URLs directing elsewhere). 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** This document is issued by a "Revisor Fiscal" (statutory auditor) of NEWSAT S.A.S., not by DIAN or Chamber of Commerce. It's a corporate certification. I'll verify the document's purpose by examining its detailed ownership information. The certification provides a comprehensive snapshot of the company's shareholding structure, detailing each shareholder's stake with precise financial and percentage breakdowns. It appears to be an official corporate document intended for governmental and financial entities. The shareholding reveals three key stakeholders with specific ownership percentages, indicating a carefully structured corporate ownership model. This type of document serves critical legal and financial reporting requirements. The Chamber of Commerce certification strongly confirms the document's authenticity as an official record of corporate ownership composition. Key validation points include precise shareholder details, explicit ownership percentages, and a formal corporate certification format. The document definitively represents the company's shareholding structure with high confidence.
